posts.description: Computer Science and Design Technology department has requested these monitors to replace outdated displays in their computer labs. The current monitors lack the resolution and color accuracy required for advanced design software, programming environments, and multimedia applications.

details.asset_description: High-resolution display for vocational training in graphic design, video editing, and programming
details.detail_description: The Package and asset are completely fine, no damage

posts.description: Room 150 in need of a screen for teaching
